name: Burning Monkey Casino
overview: Whether your game is slots, blackjack, or video poker, the Burning Monkey Casino is open 24 hours a day with ultra-mod lighting and major payouts! Step up to the machines and try your luck with these gorgeous renditions of the popular casino games. Made for the Mac, these games use the latest technology for superior graphics and effects! Want more games? Follow the elusive Queen in 3 Card Monty, or try your luck with a scratch-off lottery ticket from the gift shop. Burning Monkey Casino gives you the absolute best casino gaming experience for the Mac! Hit the jackpot and win a real prize!
